descriptions.productionDescription: Record actual counts, disruptions and rejects for a certain part and shift.
descriptions.teamMonitorDescription: Team Monitor for the Digital Error Mirroring (only assembly lines)
descriptions.measuresDescription: Define and track measures for disruptions and units.
descriptions.dashboardDescription: View evaluation of OEE, actual count target, downtime and quality for machine units.
descriptions.shopFloorDashboardDescription: Day-by-Day evaluation of actual counts, disruptions and defects.
descriptions.longTermDashboardDescription: Week-by-week evaluation of actual counts, disruptions, OEE and defects.
descriptions.adminDescription: Maintain master data for iProcess Production.
